Cf. Tilley (1950)

_description: A proverbial saying about hunger — one couplet

OxfBal354.Transcription: A fastyng belymay neuer be mery
OxfBal354.Note:
In a collection of 55 proverbs in Latin and English; translating
                        ‘Ieiunus venter nescit gaudire libenter…’, which
                    follows.

         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
